SELECT /* MusicDetailMapper.xml, getMusicDetail, SAC : 정희원 , 2014-01-24 */ CPD.PROD_ID AS CHNL_ID, EPD.PROD_ID AS EPSD_ID, AL_RS.PROD_ID AS ALBUM_ID, TPRC.PROD_AMT, PDESC.PROD_NM, NVL(CASE WHEN TS.AVG_EVLU_SCORE > 0 AND TS.AVG_EVLU_SCORE < 1 THEN 1 WHEN TS.AVG_EVLU_SCORE > 5 THEN 5 ELSE ROUND(TS.AVG_EVLU_SCORE, 1) END, 0) as AVG_EVLU_SCORE, NVL(TS.PRCHS_CNT, 0) AS DWLD_CNT, NVL(TS.PATICPERS_CNT, 0) AS PATICPERS_CNT, PDESC.ARTIST1_ID, PDESC.ARTIST1_NM, PDESC.ARTIST2_ID, PDESC.ARTIST2_NM, PDESC.ARTIST3_ID, PDESC.ARTIST3_NM, DECODE(MM.BELL_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) AS BELL_SPRT_YN, DECODE(MM.COLORRING_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) AS COLORRING_SPRT_YN, EPD.PROD_GRD_CD, MM.AGENCY_NM, MM.CHNL_COMP_NM, MM.OUTSD_CONTENTS_ID, MM.ISSUE_DAY, PI.FILE_PATH || PI.FILE_NM AS THM_PATH, PI.FILE_PATH || PI.FILE_NM AS ALBUM_THM_PATH, ARTIST.IMG_FILE_PATH AS ARTIST_THM_PATH, TP.PROD_STATUS_CD, PDESC.PROD_BASE_DESC, EPD.CID, MM.ALBUM_TYPE_NM, SD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD, CPD.SVC_GRP_CD, NVL((SELECT MUSIC_SPRT_YN FROM TB_CM_DEVICE CM2 WHERE CM2.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd}), 'N') AS MUSIC_SPRT_YN, NVL2(SSML.STATS_KEY, 'Y', 'N') AS LIKE_YN
FROM TB_DP_PROD CPD INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD_RSHP RS ON RS.PROD_ID = CPD.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD EPD ON EPD.PROD_ID = RS.PART_PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SD ON SD.PROD_ID = EPD.PROD_ID AND SD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD IN ( SELECT ISD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD FROM TB_CM_DEVICE CM INNER JOIN TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE ISD ON ISD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = CM.DEVICE_MODEL_CD WHERE ISD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD IN #{v} AND ISD.PROD_ID = EPD.PROD_ID AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MUSIC_SPRT_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) INNER JOIN TB_DP_MUSIC_PROD MM ON EPD.PROD_ID = MM.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD_DESC PDESC ON PDESC.PROD_ID = EPD.PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_PROD_IMG PI ON PI.PROD_ID = CPD.PROD_ID AND PI.EXPO_ORD = 1 AND PI.LANG_CD = PDESC.LANG_CD AND PI.IMG_CD = 'DP000162' -- 곡 이미지 INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP ON TP.PROD_ID = EPD.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD CTP ON CTP.PROD_ID = CPD.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE TPRC ON TPRC.PROD_ID = EPD.PROD_ID AND TPRC.TENANT_ID = TP.TENANT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS TS ON TS.PROD_ID = CPD.PROD_ID AND TS.TENANT_ID = TP.TENANT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_PROD_RSHP AL_RS ON AL_RS.PART_PROD_ID = CPD.PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_ARTIST ARTIST ON PDESC.ARTIST1_ID = ARTIST.ARTIST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_SOCIAL_STATS_MBR_LIKE SSML ON SSML.TENANT_ID = TP.TENANT_ID AND SSML.STATS_KEY = CPD.PROD_ID AND SSML.STATS_CLSF = 'DP01210002' AND SSML.USER_KEY = #{userKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE CPD.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' AND CPD.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002501' AND EPD.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002502' AND RS.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND AL_RS.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010804' AND EPD.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PDESC.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND CPD.PROD_ID = #{channelId} AND TP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD IN ( 'PD000403', 'PD000404', 'PD000409' ) AND CTP.PROD_STATUS_CD IN ( 'PD000402', 'PD000403', 'PD000404' ) AND ROWNUM = 1
/* MusicDetailMapper.xml, getSubContentList, SAC : 정희원 , 2014-01-24 */ select SC.DP_PG_QULT_CD, SC.FILE_PATH, SC.FILE_SIZE from TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC where SC.PROD_ID = #{value}

SELECT RPROD.PROD_ID, RPROD.META_CLSF_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD CPROD INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD_RSHP RSHP ON RSHP.PROD_ID = CPROD.PROD_ID AND PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' -- CHNL - EPSD INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD RPROD ON RPROD.PROD_ID = RSHP.PART_PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP ON TP.PROD_ID = RSHP.PART_PROD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND CPROD.PROD_ID = #{channelId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND RPROD.META_CLSF_CD IN #{v}
